# Three keys to business transformation with Benni Blau, CPIO, SAP
Watch the episode
Episode 9: Three keys to business transformation with Benni Blau, CPIO, SAP
**Three keys to business transformation with Benni Blau, CPIO, SAP.**Transforming your workforce takes more than big speeches and fancy slide decks. Successful transformations come from the right alignment of people, technology and process. Dr.
